location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 17/3 Government Property: Plans of Agency Building'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 30; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 7-27; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence, primarily between the Political Agency in Muscat and the Executive Engineer (Persian Gulf, Bushire), regarding the Political Agency building in Muscat, including its fire precautions and the installation of electric lights and fans.The file also contains blueprints of the agency building's two floors (folios 10 and 28), a plan of the surrounding area (folio 26) and a plan of a proposed engine room (folio 27).

name.namePart: Independent Persian Gulf Sub Division, Executive Engineer
